content: crochet pumpkin gnome pattern prepare your home for the fall season with an adorable crochet pumpkin gnome this crochet pumpkin amigurumi is a perfect addition that you can crochet for yourself or as a gift for your friends > > free pattern is available on the blog here 1 > add some crochet pumpkins around her and celebrate the fall and halloween seasons the listing is for the pdf pattern not the actual toy the pattern is written in english with us crochet terms in the pdf pattern you will find step-by-step instructions on how to crochet a halloween gnome and plenty of pictures to guide you through materials -sport weight yarn -crochet hook size 2 5mm -poly fiber fill for stuffing -tapestry needle if you have any questions regarding the pattern feel free to contact us via etsy 1 https //www passionatecrafter com/pumpkin-gnome-free-crochet-pattern/
